title: Jungle Fantasy! Blonde Savage (1947) Gale Sherwood | Colorized Full Movie

sources.title: Jungle Fantasy! Blonde Savage (1947) Gale Sherwood | Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
Blonde Goddess - ruler of a primitive paradise! For her---and her secret---men dared death! 
A pilot and his partner set out to find an African village and stumble upon a surprising discovery: a blonde girl living with the native tribe

Original title: Blonde Savage (1947)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/igyVO77IpVs


Director: Steve Sekely 
Writer: Gordon Bache 
Stars: Leif Erickson, Gale Sherwood, Veda Ann Borg 
Genres: Colorized, Action, Adventure, Fantasy


00:00 Full Movie
02:09  A man named Steve Blake visits a lawyer, Mr. Bennett, and reveals his plan to potentially kill Mark Harper, the owner of the Harper Diamond Mine, if the police let him go.
07:30  A man named Mark is suspicious of a handsome stranger named Blake and hires Steve and Hoppy to locate a native tribe in the jungle.
12:45  Two men find themselves in a dangerous situation in the African jungle.
21:27  Two men find themselves in a remote village and try to uncover the truth about a mysterious girl and their employer, Harper.
28:04  A man teaches English to Meelah and Tonga while uncovering a dark secret involving murder and a diamond mine.
38:55  Connie wants to leave the jungle and strike a deal with Steve for information about Mark.
42:15  A tense confrontation occurs between the characters, resulting in the revelation of important information.
48:31  A group of people discuss their plans to protect themselves and confront someone named Harper.
56:13  Blake confronts Harper and his men, who are surrounded and forced to drop their guns.
